more.about:
A modern, yet traditional, fine dining steakhouse introducing glamour, hospitality and the cuisine of Argentina.

"Our dedication to bring a true essence of the authentic steak cuisine to the people of Asia originates from our love for quality food, prime meats and a passion for Argentina."

The Argentinian cuisine has both European as well as South American influences which makes it a perfect mix of meat, poultry, herbs and vegetables. Enjoying a juicy tenderloin, tender lamb chop or hearty rib-eye steak the restaurant also serves popular pastries, spiced sausages, fresh salads, lovely side dishes and delicious desserts.

Only using fresh and high- quality local ingredients, imported cuts from Australia, Argentina and America as well as an outstanding selection of international wines the El Gaucho satisfies by an enormous authenticity and great knowledge.

With four locations in the main cities of Vietnam and Thailand - Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi and Bangkok, the restaurant will be opening in November a new location at No.11 Trang Tien Street, Trang Tien Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi.

SukhumvitSoi 19, Sukhumvit Road, North KlongToey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand
Reservation – Tel.: +66 22 552 864 l Email:reservation.suk@elgaucho.asia
Information/Requests – Tel.: +66 22 552 864l Email: info.thailand@elgaucho.asia 
Opening hours: Daily from 7am until late.
